mapper.select: select distinct id from product order by id asc

select count(distinct contractid) from bus_online,bus where bus_online.busid=bus.id and bus.company_id= #{companyid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and date_format(bus_online.start_date, '%Y%m')=date_format(#{monthstr},'%Y%m')

select bus_line.level as leval ,count( distinct bus_online.busid) as busnum from bus_online,bus,bus_line where bus_online.busid=bus.id and bus.company_id=#{companyid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and date_format(bus_online.start_date, '%Y%m')=date_format(#{monthstr},'%Y%m') and bus.line_id=bus_line.id and bus_online.sktype=#{sktype} group by bus_line.level

select days,count(*) as busnum from bus_online,bus where bus_online.busid=bus.id and bus.company_id=#{companyid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and date_format(bus_online.start_date, '%Y%m')=date_format(#{monthstr},'%Y%m') group by days

select timeslot.name as bname,box.size as bsize,(box.size-box.remain) as normalremain,(30-box.fremain) as fremain from timeslot left join box on timeslot.id=box.slot_id where date_format(box.day, '%Y%m%d')=date_format(#{datestr},'%Y%m%d') order by timeslot.id asc

select bus_function.id, bus_function.created, bus_function.updated, bus_function.city, funcode, fundesc, bus_function.name from group_function join bus_function on bus_function.id=group_function.fun_id where group_id in
#{item}

select bus_model.name as modelName,count(*) as alrnum from bus_model,bus,bus_online where bus.id=bus_online.busid and bus_online.enable=1 and bus.model_id=bus_model.id and bus_online.publish_line_id in
#{item} group by bus_model.name
